mapper.select: /* approval-line-manager.findApprovalLineMasterDetailList : 결재선 내용 조회 */ SELECT USR_APVLLN_APVR.USR_APVLLN_UUID , USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_ID , USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_TYP_CCD , USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_SORT , USR_APVLLN_APVR.SEQ_PARLL_TYP_CCD , USR.POSI_CCD AS APRVEMP_POS_CD , ( SELECT CODE.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD_MULTLANG CODE WHERE CODE.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND CODE.CCD = 'C005' AND CODE.DTLCD = USR.POSI_CCD AND CODE.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ) AS APRVEMP_POS_NM , USR.USR_NM AS APRVEMP_USR_NM , DEPT.DEPT_CD AS APRVEMP_DEPT_CD , DEPT.DEPT_NM AS APRVEMP_DEPT_NM FROM USR_APVLLN USR_APVLLN INNER JOIN USR_APVLLN_APVR USR_APVLLN_APVR ON USR_APVLLN.TEN_ID = USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID AND USR_APVLLN.USR_APVLLN_UUID = USR_APVLLN_APVR.USR_APVLLN_UUID LEFT OUTER JOIN USR USR /* USR : 사용자 */ ON USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_ID = USR.USR_ID INNER JOIN LOGIC_ORG LOGIC_ORG /* CMP : 조직 */ ON USR.TEN_ID = LOGIC_ORG.TEN_ID AND USR.CO_CD = LOGIC_ORG.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND LOGIC_ORG.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = 'COMPANY' AND LOGIC_ORG.STS != 'D' LEFT OUTER JOIN LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG ON USR.TEN_ID = LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG.TEN_ID AND USR.CO_CD = LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG.LOGIC_ORG_CD AND USR.DEPT_CD = LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG.DEPT_CD AND LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = 'COMPANY' LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT DEPT /* DEPT : 부서 */ ON LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG.TEN_ID = DEPT.TEN_ID AND LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG.DEPT_CD = DEPT.DEPT_CD AND LOGIC_ORG.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD = LOGIC_ORG_DEPT_MAPG.LOGIC_ORG_TYP_CCD AND DEPT.STS != 'D' WHERE USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND USR_APVLLN.USR_APVLLN_UUID = #{p.usr_apvlln_uuid} ORDER BY USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_SORT ASC
mapper.insert: /* approval-line-manager.insertApprovalLineMaster : 결재선 마스터 등록 */ INSERT INTO USR_APVLLN( TEN_ID, USR_APVLLN_UUID, USR_ID, APVLLN_TYP_CCD, USR_APVLLN_TIT, APVLLN_SORT, STS, REGR_ID, REG_DTTM, MODR_ID, MOD_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{g.tenant}, #{p.usr_apvlln_uuid}, #{g.username}, '', #{p.usr_apvlln_tit}, #{p.apvlln_sort}, 'C', #{g.username}, #{g.now}, #{g.username}, #{g.now} )

/* approval-line-manager.insertApprovalLineDetail : 결재선 내용 추가 */ INSERT INTO USR_APVLLN_APVR( TEN_ID, USR_APVLLN_UUID, APVR_ID, APVR_TYP_CCD, APVR_SORT, STS, SEQ_PARLL_TYP_CCD, REGR_ID, REG_DTTM, MODR_ID, MOD_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{g.tenant}, #{p.usr_apvlln_uuid}, #{p.apvr_id}, #{p.apvr_typ_ccd}, #{p.apvr_sort}, 'C', #{p.seq_parll_typ_ccd}, #{g.username}, #{g.now}, #{g.username}, #{g.now} )
mapper.select: /* approval-line-manager.findListApprovalLineDetailForApproval : 결재선 사용자 결재라인 적용을 위한 조회 */ WITH GRADE AS ( SELECT DTLCD.TEN_ID , DTLCD.DTLCD , DTLCD.DTLCD_SORT , DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD DTLCD INNER JOIN DTLCD_MULTLANG DTLCD_MULTLANG ON DTLCD_MULTLANG.TEN_ID = DTLCD.TEN_ID AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.CCD = DTLCD.CCD AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD = DTLCD.DTLCD WHERE DTLCD.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND DTLCD.CCD = 'C005' AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ), JOBTIT AS ( SELECT DTLCD.TEN_ID , DTLCD.DTLCD , DTLCD.DTLCD_SORT , DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD DTLCD INNER JOIN DTLCD_MULTLANG DTLCD_MULTLANG ON DTLCD_MULTLANG.TEN_ID = DTLCD.TEN_ID AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.CCD = DTLCD.CCD AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD = DTLCD.DTLCD WHERE DTLCD.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND DTLCD.CCD = 'G012' AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ) SELECT USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_ID AS USR_ID , USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_TYP_CCD , USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_SORT , USR_APVLLN_APVR.SEQ_PARLL_TYP_CCD , USR.POSI_CCD , GRADE.DTLCD_NM AS POSI_NM , USR.JOBTIT_CCD , JOBTIT.DTLCD_NM AS APVR_JOBTIT_NM , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN USR.USR_NM_EN ELSE USR.USR_NM END AS USR_NM , DEPT.DEPT_CD , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN DEPT.DEPT_NM_EN ELSE DEPT.DEPT_NM END AS APVR_DEPT_NM FROM USR_APVLLN USR_APVLLN INNER JOIN USR_APVLLN_APVR USR_APVLLN_APVR ON USR_APVLLN.TEN_ID = USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID AND USR_APVLLN.USR_APVLLN_UUID = USR_APVLLN_APVR.USR_APVLLN_UUID INNER JOIN USR USR /* USR : 사용자 */ ON USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_ID = USR.USR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN JOBTIT ON JOBTIT.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND JOBTIT.DTLCD = USR.JOBTIT_CCD LEFT OUTER JOIN GRADE ON GRADE.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND GRADE.DTLCD = USR.POSI_CCD LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT DEPT /* DEPT : 부서 */ ON DEPT.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND DEPT.DEPT_CD = USR.DEPT_CD AND DEPT.STS != 'D' WHERE USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_TYP_CCD IN ('APVL', 'AG', 'PARLL_AG') AND USR_APVLLN.USR_APVLLN_UUID = #{p.usr_apvlln_uuid} ORDER BY USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_SORT ASC

/* approval-line-manager.findListReferenceListDetailForApproval : 수신,참조자 결재라인 적용을 위한 조회 */ WITH GRADE AS ( SELECT DTLCD.TEN_ID , DTLCD.DTLCD , DTLCD.DTLCD_SORT , DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD DTLCD INNER JOIN DTLCD_MULTLANG DTLCD_MULTLANG ON DTLCD_MULTLANG.TEN_ID = DTLCD.TEN_ID AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.CCD = DTLCD.CCD AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD = DTLCD.DTLCD WHERE DTLCD.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND DTLCD.CCD = 'C005' AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ), JOBTIT AS ( SELECT DTLCD.TEN_ID , DTLCD.DTLCD , DTLCD.DTLCD_SORT , DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD_NM FROM DTLCD DTLCD INNER JOIN DTLCD_MULTLANG DTLCD_MULTLANG ON DTLCD_MULTLANG.TEN_ID = DTLCD.TEN_ID AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.CCD = DTLCD.CCD AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.DTLCD = DTLCD.DTLCD WHERE DTLCD.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND DTLCD.CCD = 'G012' AND DTLCD_MULTLANG.LANG_CCD = #{g.locale} ) SELECT USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_ID AS USR_ID , USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_TYP_CCD AS RDG_TYP_CCD , USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_SORT , USR_APVLLN_APVR.SEQ_PARLL_TYP_CCD , USR.POSI_CCD , GRADE.DTLCD_NM AS POSI_NM , USR.JOBTIT_CCD , JOBTIT.DTLCD_NM AS USR_JOBTIT_NM , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN USR.USR_NM_EN ELSE USR.USR_NM END AS USR_NM , DEPT.DEPT_CD , CASE WHEN 'en_US' = #{g.locale} THEN DEPT.DEPT_NM_EN ELSE DEPT.DEPT_NM END AS USR_DEPT_NM FROM USR_APVLLN USR_APVLLN INNER JOIN USR_APVLLN_APVR USR_APVLLN_APVR ON USR_APVLLN.TEN_ID = USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID AND USR_APVLLN.USR_APVLLN_UUID = USR_APVLLN_APVR.USR_APVLLN_UUID INNER JOIN USR USR /* USR : 사용자 */ ON USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_ID = USR.USR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN JOBTIT ON JOBTIT.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND JOBTIT.DTLCD = USR.JOBTIT_CCD LEFT OUTER JOIN GRADE ON GRADE.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND GRADE.DTLCD = USR.POSI_CCD LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT DEPT /* DEPT : 부서 */ ON DEPT.TEN_ID = USR.TEN_ID AND DEPT.DEPT_CD = USR.DEPT_CD AND DEPT.STS != 'D' WHERE USR_APVLLN_APVR.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_TYP_CCD IN ('RCPT', 'REF') AND USR_APVLLN.USR_APVLLN_UUID = #{p.usr_apvlln_uuid} ORDER BY USR_APVLLN_APVR.APVR_SORT ASC
